Package assignment1.Action.sec311

Class Action

java.lang.Object
assignment1.Action.sec311.Action
Direct Known Subclasses:
OccasionalAction, RareAction, RegularAction
public abstract class Action extends Object
Action.java superclass for Assignment 1 Submission This is the Action Superclass class that provides a catalog of actions to be carried out in view of COVID-19 OPH protocols. This abstract class serves as a base for the 3 other subclasses.
Since:
javac 11.0.12
Version:
1.1
Author:
Richard Duong
